node0.NODE_DESCRIPTION: Tony needs to get John out of Jail. Press Continue to progress the story

node1.NODE_DESCRIPTION: Tony will make a decision on his own based on his Traits (Look Right) which you can alter and save

node2.NODE_DESCRIPTION: Tony has 3 options to get John out (See below). Tony will choose different options depending on his currently saved traits

node3.NODE_DESCRIPTION: Based on his Traits, you are on the Killer Path. Tony decided to Kill the Guards and break John out

node4.NODE_NAME: Sneak In And Break John Out
node4.NODE_DESCRIPTION: Based on his Traits, you are on the Scoundrel Path. Tony decided to Kill the Guards and break John out

node5.NODE_DESCRIPTION: Based on his Traits, you are on the Good Citizen Path. Tony decided pay John's Bail money
